    As much as I enjoy watching pointless arguments, this could drive another 
wedge between people in the group.  We don't need that.  Alten, as amusing as 
the post was, it went beyond the bounds of good taste.  From an objective 
perspective, Yan probably could have been less harsh but his point was valid.
